attributes.action: Extend the metro system from Tyne & Wear through Durham and Teesside.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the urge to move people from cars onto public transport, we would urge the Prime Minister to take this opportunity to use the North East as a showcase and commit the North East councils to extend the Metro system from Tyne & Wear through County Durham and into Teesside connecting the major towns.
